title: E392 Trauma Restoration Man
itunes:title: Trauma Restoration Man
description:
Trauma restoration man Bobby Cotton joins Theo to discuss what it's like working in the restoration industry, where he cleans up after hoarders, fires, murders and suicides, riots, natural disasters, and more. 

------------------------------------------------

Tour Dates! https://theovon.com/tour

New Merch: https://www.theovonstore.com

Podcastville mugs and prints available now at https://theovon.pixels.com
